name: DEAD DROP (itch) (Cameron Kent, Connor Younger)
description:
________________________________________________________________________________

Get dropped into a no life zone to survive as long as possible against the hungry dead. 
 Fight off waves of undead and earn points to upgrade your guns or open up new areas of Ground Zero for the infection!

________________________________________________________________________________

Compatible with Keyboard & Mouse or Controller Input

Single &  Multiplayer Prototypes have varied experiences

In development by Two Seas Games

Cameron Kent & Connor Younger
